key: thông tin, giới thiệu, mô tả, chi tiết, info, information, description, about, lịch sử, history, kể về, cho biết về
sql_template: SELECT SubProjectName, Introduction FROM {prefix}.SubProjects WHERE SubProjectName LIKE :place_name AND ProjectID = :project_id
description: Query general information about a location

key: vị trí, địa chỉ, ở đâu, location, address, where, đường đi, direction, chỉ đường, cách đi, how to get, bản đồ, map
sql_template: SELECT SubProjectName, Location FROM {prefix}.SubProjects WHERE SubProjectName LIKE :place_name AND ProjectID = :project_id
description: Query location and directions for a place

key: video, audio, media, xem video, nghe, play, mở video, mở bài, phát
sql_template: SELECT sp.SubProjectID, sp.SubProjectName, a.AttractionName, am.MediaType, am.MediaURL FROM {prefix}.SubProjects sp JOIN {prefix}.SubProjectAttractions a ON sp.SubProjectID = a.SubProjectID JOIN {prefix}.SubProjectAttractionMedia am ON a.SubProjectAttractionID = am.SubProjectAttractionID WHERE sp.SubProjectName = :place_name AND sp.ProjectID = :project_id AND am.MediaType = 'video'
description: Query video media for a location

key: làm gì, tham quan gì, xem gì, có gì, attractions, things to do, what to see, điểm tham quan, hoạt động
sql_template: SELECT TOP 5 sp.SubProjectName, a.AttractionName, a.Introduction FROM {prefix}.SubProjects sp JOIN {prefix}.SubProjectAttractions a ON sp.SubProjectID = a.SubProjectID WHERE sp.SubProjectName LIKE :place_name AND sp.ProjectID = :project_id ORDER BY a.SortOrder
description: Query list of attractions within a location
